thread.title: Watch three sumo wrestlers compete in epic foot race
thread.title_full: Watch three sumo wrestlers compete in epic foot race

title: Watch three sumo wrestlers compete in epic foot race
text:
Watch three sumo wrestlers compete in epic foot race Slow and steady wins the race. Post to Facebook Watch three sumo wrestlers compete in epic foot race Slow and steady wins the race.   WFAA.com: http://on.wfaa.com/1S1o9jm   Join the Conversation To   Watch three sumo wrestlers compete in epic foot race Landon Haaf, WFAA Sports 4:56 p.m. CDT October 23, 2015 Sumo wrestlers compete in an epic foot race (Photo: @ghetto_stone on Twitter) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Slow and steady wins the race. 
In this case, though, slow and steady wins, places and shows. But that’s not the point. 
Three sumo wrestlers came up with the wonderful idea of running a foot race, and it’ll likely be the best 7.5 seconds of your day. 今日は和歌山巡業！土俵の外でも熱い戦いがありました
手前から天風関、魁鵬、貴天秀さん pic.twitter.com/2rBKPbD4Kl — 石浦将勝 (@ghetto_stone) October 19, 2015 
It has to be one of the most captivating sprints since the 2012 London games. 
The only one we can think of that might be better would be if the Dirk Nowitzki vs. Peyton Manning 40-yard dash actually happens. Had this debate the other day in the locker room: Who wins a 40 yard dash between me and Peyton Manning??? — Dirk Nowitzki (@swish41) October 23, 2015 
Thanks to USA TODAY's For The Win for pointing this out!
